publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-594 David Stewart: Highland Diabetes Institute—That the Parliament congratulates representatives of NHS Highland, UHI Millenium Institute and LifeScan Scotland on signing a partnership agreement to develop the Highland Diabetes Institute, a purpose-built facility to bring together researchers to develop ideas for the treatment of diabetes, and welcomes the commitment of these organisations to develop both better treatments for sufferers of diabetes and the provision of better treatment facilities at Raigmore Hospital.
S3M-594 Highland Diabetes Institute (lodged on 2 October 2007) Mary Scanlon*

S3M-594 David Stewart: Highland Diabetes Institute—That the Parliament congratulates representatives of NHS Highland, UHI Millenium Institute and LifeScan Scotland on signing a partnership agreement to develop the Highland Diabetes Institute, a purpose-built facility to bring together researchers to develop ideas for the treatment of diabetes, and welcomes the commitment of these organisations to develop both better treatments for sufferers of diabetes and the provision of better treatment facilities at Raigmore Hospital. Supported by: Mary Scanlon
S3M-594 Highland Diabetes Institute (lodged on 2 October 2007) Christine Grahame*
S3M-594 Highland Diabetes Institute (lodged on 2 October 2007) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-594 Highland Diabetes Institute (lodged on 2 October 2007) Dr Richard Simpson*
